name: Girl
text: Are you here to meet the blacksmith perchanse?

name: You
text: Actually, yes I am. Do you know where he is?

name: Girl
text: Ofcourse I know where he, he's my father

name: You
text: Oh, okay. Can i have some directions maybe?

name: Girl
text: Go down the road to the right over all the dangerous gaps between the islands.

name: Girl
text: You will then smell the beautiful scent of melted iron. That's my fathers forge!

name: Girl
text: It's nothing much but i can assure you that he knows what he's doing

name: You
text: Okay, thank you ms ... whats you name?

name: Blanchette
text: It's Blanchette and you're welcome sir..?

name: You
text: Isolderick is my name. Have a frolic day ms Blanchette

name: Blanchette
text: Oh and by the way. The pig purple capsule thingy is a respawn point

name: Blanchette
text: So if you happend to experience tragic accident, don't worry. You'll be back in no time!
